subdivision_of_building: ground floor rear patio, first floor and loft floor.

superseding_details.unit_reference: First Floor Flat, 137 Southfield Road, Chiswick, W4 5LB
superseding_details.component_description: Rear extension wil be longer, up to 5 meters from proposed main roof slope domer. 8 solar panels . French doors and metal balcony with spiral stairs. Partial chimney stack removal. Window replacement.

decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): Location Plan 2-Aug-2024; PA2 - 101 Rev A Location & Proposed Block Plans; PA2 - 102 Rev A Existing Ground Floor Plan; PA2 - 103 Rev A Existing First Floor Plan; PA2 - 104 Rev A Existing & Proposed Loft Plan; PA2 - 105 Rev A Existing & Proposed Roof Plan; PA2 - 106 Rev A Existing & Proposed Elevation A; PA2 - 107 Rev A Existing & Proposed Elevation B; PA2 - 108 Rev A Existing & Proposed Elevation C; PA2 - 109 Rev A Existing & Proposed Elevation D
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Creation of a balcony/terrace to the first floor rear elevation including installation of a spiral stairs to provide access to the patio; replacement of windows;  roof extension to rear (main) roofslope; part rear roof extension to rear outrigger roof slope and installation of two roof lights to front roof slope; installation of solar panels; partly removal of the existing chimney stack
